channel.title: Completely Clueless
channel.description:
I know nothing about editing private servers. Absolutely nothing.
Idk what programs are needed to edit them. And i also do not know how to run a private server after i've downloaded a source. I don't mean run it for other people, i mean just run it for me to play by myself.
I've noticed you guys are kinda hard on people new to this subject, but i'm hopeful you'll find some compassion somewhere and just give me some information to get me started :P Because as of now, i know next to nothing, but i'm interested in learning. I don't need helping with editing itself. I need to know HOW to edit though. Where to find the files i need to open, and what to open them with. I also need to know how to play the client after editing so i can see what I've done in-game.
Thank you very very much in advance to anyone who can tell me anything. I appreciate it guys, thanks :)
-Sl0th

item.title: Completely Clueless
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:11, topic:264630”][quote author=S4mk27 link=topic=349434.msg2687356#msg2687356 date=1235757009]
I’ve looked through forums, and i can’t figure out how to change max level. =\

I downloaded an XML editor, and discovered on my own how to edit NPC’s, Item’s, and drop rates and all that good stuff.

But i’m still unsure about how to change the max level. And i’m also having trouble with EXP rate if someone can help me out please.

Thank you very much

EDIT:: I found out how to change the Experience rate. But i still have no idea how to edit the max level, and i also need to know where to go to edit the colors of wielded weapons.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 27, 2009, 03:11:43 pm[/size][hr]A second problem. When i edit the wep aim, wep power, armor bonues, and prayer magic and ranged bonus on my items it doesn’t appear in game.

I use an XML notepad program to edit the values for each item in the ItemWieldableDef.XML file.

Then i save it, compile, and open the server. But it doesn’t work =\

Help plz?
[/quote]

When editing the ItemWieldableDef.xml you edit the right thing.

Example: search for 81, this is for R2h. I am sure I read somewhere in a tutorial on here that the was for the item ID, when it’s actually .

Take a look at the Animations.RSCD file for changing the colour when wearing ^^[/quote]

He didnt ask to change the color but its most probably because you didnt compile the server after you saved your file.
That is probably the most common problem for newer “coders”

And try not to pay attention to Lolwut44 hes grouchy and doesnt offer help, he is quite angry that he lost his mod so if he says anything about “helping” you, you should probably ignore it, as it will do you no good.

Read full topic

item.title: Completely Clueless
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“S4mk27, post:10, topic:264630”]I’ve looked through forums, and i can’t figure out how to change max level. =\

I downloaded an XML editor, and discovered on my own how to edit NPC’s, Item’s, and drop rates and all that good stuff.

But i’m still unsure about how to change the max level. And i’m also having trouble with EXP rate if someone can help me out please.

Thank you very much

EDIT:: I found out how to change the Experience rate. But i still have no idea how to edit the max level, and i also need to know where to go to edit the colors of wielded weapons.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 27, 2009, 03:11:43 pm[/size][hr]A second problem. When i edit the wep aim, wep power, armor bonues, and prayer magic and ranged bonus on my items it doesn’t appear in game.

I use an XML notepad program to edit the values for each item in the ItemWieldableDef.XML file.

Then i save it, compile, and open the server. But it doesn’t work =\

Help plz? :)[/quote]

When editing the ItemWieldableDef.xml you edit the right thing.

Example: search for 81, this is for R2h. I am sure I read somewhere in a tutorial on here that the was for the item ID, when it’s actually .

Take a look at the Animations.RSCD file for changing the colour when wearing ^^

Read full topic

There is a “src” folder in both the “client” and the “server” folder. i’m assuming i edit the ones in the “server” folder, is that correct?[/quote]No, maybe the both the client and the server are edit-able? Did you ever think of that?

item.title: Completely Clueless
item.dc:creator: @S4mk27 S4mk27
item.description:
@S4mk27 wrote:

Ok! i took your advice, and through a combination of Google and Moparscape forums i was able to piece together how to run a local server for me to play only. But for the life of me i can’t figure out which files to edit, and how to edit them to change things in-game. I’m using Divine PK source, and when i open the the folder it’s stored in, there are 4 folder i can open: “Client”, “Mysql database”, “Server”, and “www”.

Where do i go to reach the files that i edit to change things in-game, and what do i use to edit them? Am i able to use notepad or do i need a specific program.

Thanks for anything you can help me with

Read full topic

item.title: Completely Clueless
item.dc:creator: @Iron_Maiden1 Iron Maiden
item.description:
@Iron_Maiden1 wrote:

1.download java jdk
2.download apache ant
3.spend 2 -3 hours reading through posts and tuts on this forum
4.the search button is your friend.

there are tuts for all the things needed but there are hidden in back pages…

Read full topic
